title: Barbecue Sauce

ingredients.content: 5 ½ oz yellow onions, halved (approx. 1 md. onion)

preparations.content: Place salt, pepper, cinnamon stick, coffee, cumin seeds and chili powder into mixing bowl and grind <b>45 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add brown sugar and grind <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add 1 oz Dry Rub and mustard and cook <b>30 sec/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add vinegar, Worcestershire and molasses and cook <b>10 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add ketchup and blend <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a jar and serve or refrigerate until needed.

hintsAndTricks: To ensure preservation, clean jars thoroughly in hot soapy water. Rinse by pouring boiling water over them. Prepare for filling by placing clean jars in a baking pan and heat in oven (212°F) until required. Pour into jars while jars are still warm and proceed as directed by the recipe.
